metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2619 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Settings in Google Chromeprior to 104.0.5112.79 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to installa malicious extension to inject scripts or HTML into a privileged page viaa crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
